channel.title: Ruben van Heerden
channel.description: Recent content on Ruben van Heerden

item.title: About
item.description: In 2022, I was a Matriculant at HTS John Vorster in Pretoria. I see myself as an outgoing person, hard worker and fast learner. I have very good communication skills. I love working with people and make friends very easy. I am an enrolled 3rd year student for 2025 at NGI (Newbridge Graduate Institute) in Centurion. I am doing my Diploma in Electronic Engineering. I’m looking for a vacancy in this field to do my Work Integrated Learning Module (WIL). As part of the ‘Voortrekkers’ I have received The National Award in Cultural Leadership, which is the highest reward as a scholar.
